wisdom.translation[0].definitions[0].def: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life
wisdom.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
Local people are questioning the wisdom of spending so much money on a new road.
wisdom.translation[0].definitions[1].def: knowledge gained over a long period of time through learning or experience
wisdom.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the collected wisdom of many centuries
